title: Join us as a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to run high-impact campaigns for our clients.
job_overview:
Join us as a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to run high-impact campaigns for our clients.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on expertise

What you will do:

Plan, execute, and refine paid ad campaigns.

Track performance and optimize for KPIs.

Work remotely with flexibility.

Requirements:

1+ year experience with paid advertising platforms.

Detail-oriented and results-driven.
